title: Can we use copyrighted music in videos for Instagram stories? How does it legally work? What are the consequences? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, you can't use copyrighted music without a license. You need a contract with the copyright owner. If you use it anyway you can get sued, because you ignored the copyright law. Depending on the cost of the lawsuit and the size of your assets you could eventually go out of business.
